data.message: Facebook I can't see visitor post on pages that allow that it just says no stories available how do I fix this. I know good and well that people post on pages such as airlines pages about there good and bad I want to read and see the post. I can post I just can't see other peoples post.

replies.message: Hi Blake. Page admins have access to post approvals, which dictate who can post and which visitor posts appear on a Page. It's possible that an admin made a change within these settings, hiding visitor posts. Here's a little more information on the subject: http://bit.ly/2e8PY0B. -Nick
I can see a few but that's it. They all disappeared on the same day so I think it's a glitch. I have the feelings my that 20 pages don't n't change a setting at the same time on the same day.
Hey Blake. If you believe a feature isn't working properly, you can report it to us using these steps: http://bit.ly/2e8RyQ3. Thanks! -Jessica

I know that no one does anything with that. If comments are hidden by page the option to post wouldn't exist right? Like on this page I can comment on your post but I can't message you or post on your page.
I am on an iPad those steps you sent only work on the full site
Mi bella soledad mi mundo incierto. Quisiera recuperar todo lo perdido es mi ilusión y mi esperanza. Llevame a un mundo desconocido donde iré a jugar con mi dolor y lo perdido
